content: **from the description ** a delicate thread bedspread from the fifties gets new life as an unexpected set of chunky flowery pillows **skill level ** easy **gauge ** rounds 1-3 on back = 4 5 / 11 5cm square **yardage ** exact yardage not stated yardage shown is the total of 4 skeins of the suggested yarn called for by the pattern **additional materials ** - 12 / 30 5cm square pillow form - two 13 / 33cm square pieces of coordinating fabric - sewing needle - matching thread
